description: This file is an entry server script for a Remix.run web application, responsible for handling server-side rendering requests, including managing bot requests and normal browser requests using React server components and streaming.

methods.name: handleRequest
methods.description: Main exported function that handles incoming requests, distinguishing bots from browsers, setting CORS headers, and delegating to appropriate handlers.

methods.name: handleBotRequest
methods.description: Handles requests identified as coming from bots, rendering the React app stream and returning the response.

methods.name: handleBrowserRequest
methods.description: Handles requests from browsers, rendering the React app stream similarly to bot requests.
